title: To Aru Majutsu no Index
alternative_title: A Certain Magical Index, とある魔術の禁書目録, Toaru Majutsu no Index
description: In a world where science clarifies supernatural powers. In a huge college that has power development in its curriculum. To a resident high school student, Kamijou Touma, a pure white sister appears. She calls herself “Index” and says that sorcerers are chasing her. Thus, Kamijou Touma enters the world of the occult.
